item.description:
Help Send YOUR Demons to the National Titles! This October we are traveling to Colorado Springs to take on the best in the country and to help us get there we are holding an Olympics of our own to coincide with the real thing going on in China.

This is the deal- organise yourselves into teams of 4 or more, nominate a captain and a country you would like to represent and compete in the following pub tournaments...

Beer Pong
Paper/Scissors/Rock
The Washer Toss
Table Soccer
Olympic Trivia

for the chance to win...

Cash Prizes
Aussie Wine and Food
Medals
Glory and Respect

$10 entry $10 Donation

This will be a cracking afternoon so start thinking about getting your teams together now!
If you don't have a team and want to get involved, no problemos, we will be putting teams together on the day.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Pub Olympics hosted by the Demons
